remarks: Contraposition law for the covers relation.  ( ~ cvcon3 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2011.)
statement:
cvrcon3b.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrcon3b.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
cvrcon3b.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrcon3b $p |- ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X C Y <-> ( ._|_ ` Y ) C ( ._|_ ` X ) ) ) $.
